section.heading: Common Interest Community Repairs Program; eligibility.
section.text: To be eligible for the Program, a common interest community shall meet the following requirements:

para.text: A common interest community shall have at least 5 units;

At least 2/3rds of a common interest community's owner-occupied or shareholder-occupied units shall be occupied by households with a household income, as defined by § 47-1806.09(4), of no greater than 60% of the MFI;
The board shall be registered with the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs; and
A common interest community may not have received services under the Program in the past year.
